title: SKIN GIFT From Riot???
body:
I just got the Blood Moon Thresh Skin as a gift...
it says it's from riot gaming, did not know this can happen

replies.body:
Riot is giving out free skins to well-behaved players in 2014 (No bans or chat restrictions).
Congrats on the skin, I got Aether Wing Kayle :D
I was wondering how do u get these skins keep in mind im only level 19
SWEET!! Congrats!! Nice skin OP! Still waiting for mine also. No bans at all so it should be in my box soon :D

I hope I get one
I think I have been positive this year

good behavior reward..

lucky dog!@ that skin looks amazing 

I got bladecraft oriana
its a gift , I like it , just don't use orianna much shes pretty trash right now with mana regen uber nerfs but im gratefull the skin does look great
Just got Ragdoll Poppy!!!!!! Who ever knew that good behavior could be soooo rewarding?????
It's your gift for being well-behaved in 2014.  I didn't get mine yet, either.
i didnt get my gift yet :(
